com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence

Interface PersistentEntityRegistry


  • public interface PersistentEntityRegistry
    At system startup all PersistentEntity classes must be registered here with register(java.lang.Class<? extends com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.PersistentEntity<C, E, S>>).

    Later, PersistentEntityRef can be retrieved with refFor(java.lang.Class<? extends com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.persistence.PersistentEntity<C, ?, ?>>, java.lang.String). Commands are sent to a PersistentEntity using a PersistentEntityRef.

      java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<akka.Done> gracefulShutdown(scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration timeout)

      Retrieve a PersistentEntityRef for a given PersistentEntity class and identifier.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        <C,E,S> void register(Class<? extends PersistentEntity<C,E,S>> entityClass)
        At system startup all PersistentEntity classes must be registered with this method.

      • refFor

        <C> PersistentEntityRef<C> refFor(Class<? extends PersistentEntity<C,?,?>> entityClass,
                                  String entityId)
        Retrieve a PersistentEntityRef for a given PersistentEntity class and identifier. Commands are sent to a PersistentEntity using a PersistentEntityRef.

      • eventStream

        <Event extends AggregateEvent<Event>> akka.stream.javadsl.Source<akka.japi.Pair<Event,java.util.UUID>,akka.NotUsed> eventStream(AggregateEventTag<Event> aggregateTag,
                                                                                                                                java.util.Optional<java.util.UUID> fromOffset)
        A stream of the persistent events that have the given aggregateTag, e.g. all persistent events of all Order entities.

      • gracefulShutdown

        java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<akka.Done> gracefulShutdown(scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration timeout)
        Gracefully stop the persistent entities and leave the cluster. The persistent entities will be started on another node when new messages are sent to them.

        Returns:
        the CompletionStage is completed when the node has been removed from the cluster
